im currently running 66 mods with no crashes. try Avera9eJoe's Endraxial planet conversions (converts planets to DDS textures), the low res version of EVE (if you use EVE) with Oinkers_Proot_City_Lights_DDS replacing the city lights, Oinkers_Kerbal_Skybox_2.0_brighter. set game textures to eighth res (the planet conversions make planets still look high res from afar instead of foggy, and the oinkers skybox keeps the skybox lookin sharp despite eighth res). and use openforceGL. i may have left something out im not sure but with those things you should be able to run all the mods you want while sitting at 2.9-3.1mb. a crash happens at 3.8ish MB (it adds up really slowly). you can keep track of it with the GCMonitor mod.

We can hope, but realistically it will likely only make memory management worse. With every major update, this "game" has become more and more memory intensive.
